verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jerusalem the golden, with milk and honey blest, beneath your contemplation sink heart and voice oppressed; I know not, O I know not what joys await us there, what radiancy of glory, what bliss beyond compare!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: They stand, those halls of Zion, all jubilant with song, and bright with many an angel, and all the martyr throng; the Prince is ever in them, the daylight is serene; the pastures of the blessed are decked in glorious sheen.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There is the throne of David; and there, from care released, the shout of them that triumph, the song of them that feast; and they, who with their Leader have conquered in the fight, forever and forever are clad in robes of white.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O sweet and blessed country, the home of God's elect! O sweet and blessed country that eager hearts expect! In mercy, Jesus, bring us to that dear land of rest, who are, with God the Father and Spirit, ever blest.
